title: Justice Dr Shirani Bandaranayake- Acting Chief Justice
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix By: Sudath Silva) Senior Supreme court Judge, Justice Dr Shirani Bandaranayake took oaths as the Acting Chief Justice before President Mahinda Rajapaksa at the President’s House this morning on Sunday 21st February. She took oaths in the post as Chief Justice Asoka De Silva is on an…
